018package org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.codebuilders;
019
020import static java.util.stream.Collectors.joining;
021import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.FINAL;
022import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PRIVATE;
023import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PUBLIC;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.MAINTAINED;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_DuplicateOptionName;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_InvalidCLIType;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_NoArgumentIndex;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_NoOptionName;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_CLI_MANDATORY;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_CLI_MULTIVALUED;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_IS_ARGUMENT;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_IS_OPTION;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_CLIDefinitions;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_CLIError;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_WriteLock;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardMethod.STD_METHOD_GetRessourceBundle;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.Primitives.BOOLEAN;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.Primitives.VOID;
039import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.REDUNDANT_EXPLICIT_VARIABLE_TYPE;
040import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.createSuppressWarningsAnnotation;
041import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.DebugOutput.ifDebug;
042import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
043import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
044import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.capitalize;
045import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
046
047import java.io.IOException;
048import java.io.OutputStream;
049import java.util.ArrayList;
050import java.util.Collection;
051import java.util.HashMap;
052import java.util.HashSet;
053import java.util.List;
054import java.util.Map;
055import java.util.Optional;
056import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
057
058import org.apiguardian.api.API;
059import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
060import org.tquadrat.foundation.ap.IllegalAnnotationError;
061import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.CmdLineException;
062import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ConfigUtil;
063import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec;
064import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.cli.CmdLineValueHandler;
065import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.cli.SimpleCmdLineValueHandler;
066import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.internal.ClassRegistry;
067import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.spi.CLIArgumentDefinition;
068import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.spi.CLIDefinition;
069import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.spi.CLIOptionDefinition;
070import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ArrayTypeName;
071import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ClassName;
072import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.FieldSpec;
073import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ParameterizedTypeName;
074import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeName;
075import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.WildcardTypeName;
076import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects;
077
078/**
079 *  The
080 *  {@linkplain org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder code builder implementation}
081 *  for the CLI stuff, as defined in
082 *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.CLIBeanSpec}.
083 *
084 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
085 *  @version $Id: CLIBeanBuilder.java 1008 2022-02-05 03:18:07Z tquadrat $
086 *  @UMLGraph.link
087 *  @since 0.1.0
088 */
089@SuppressWarnings( "OverlyCoupledClass" )
090@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: CLIBeanBuilder.java 1008 2022-02-05 03:18:07Z tquadrat $" )
091@API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.1.0" )
092public final class CLIBeanBuilder extends CodeBuilderBase
093{
094        /*------------*\
095    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
096        \*------------*/
097    /**
098     *  The handler classes.
099     */
100    private final Map<TypeName,ClassName> m_HandlerClasses = new HashMap<>();
101
102        /*--------------*\
103    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
104        \*--------------*/
105    /**
106     *  Creates a new instance of {@code CLIBeanBuilder}.
107     *
108     *  @param  context The code generator context.
109     */
110    public CLIBeanBuilder( final CodeGeneratorContext context )
111    {
112        super( context );
113
114        for( final var entry : ClassRegistry.m_HandlerClasses.entrySet() )
115        {
116            m_HandlerClasses.put( TypeName.from( entry.getKey() ), ClassName.from( entry.getValue() ) );
117        }
118    }   //  CLIBeanBuilder()
119
120        /*---------*\
121    ====** Methods **==========================================================
122        \*---------*/
123    /**
124     *  {@inheritDoc}
125     *  <p>This method checks whether there are any properties that are either
126     *  options or arguments, and does the build only when there is at least
127     *  one.</p>
128     *  <p>Not building CLI stuff will let crash the compilation of the
129     *  generated code, but this is intended: either the annotation for the
130     *  CLI properties is missing, or the interface
131     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.CLIBeanSpec}
132     *  was added to the configuration bean specification in error.</p>
133     */
134    @Override
135    public final void build()
136    {
137        var doBuild = false;
138        //noinspection ForLoopWithMissingComponent
139        for( final var i = getProperties(); i.hasNext() && !doBuild; )
140        {
141            final var property = i.next();
142            doBuild = property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_IS_OPTION ) || property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_IS_ARGUMENT );
143        }
144        if( doBuild ) doBuild();
145    }   //  build()
146
147    /**
148     *  Composes the code that creates the CLI value handler for the given
149     *  property.
150     *
151     *  @param  property    The property.
152     *  @return The name of the method that creates the CLI value handler for
153     *      this property.
154     */
155    private final String composeValueHandlerCreation( final PropertySpec property )
156    {
157        //---* The method name *-----------------------------------------------
158        final var retValue = format( "composeValueHandler_%s", capitalize( property.getPropertyName() ) );
159
160        //---* The lambda that sets the value to the attribute *---------------
161        final var lambdaType = ParameterizedTypeName.from( ClassName.from( BiConsumer.class ), ClassName.from( String.class ), property.getPropertyType().box() );
162        final var lambda = getComposer().lambdaBuilder()
163            .addParameter( "propertyName" )
164            .addParameter( "value" )
165            .addCode( "$N = value", property.getFieldName() )
166            .build();
167
168        //---* Retrieve the class for the value handler *----------------------
169        final var objectType = WildcardTypeName.subtypeOf( Object.class );
170        final var handlerType = ParameterizedTypeName.from( ClassName.from( CmdLineValueHandler.class ), objectType );
171        final var valueHandlerClass = retrieveValueHandlerClass( property );
172        final var builder = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder();
173        valueHandlerClass.ifPresentOrElse(
174            t -> builder.addStatement( "final $T retValue = new $T( lambda ) ", handlerType, t ),
175            () ->
176            {
177                final var stringConverter = property.getStringConverterClass()
178                    .orElseThrow( () -> new IllegalAnnotationError( format( "No String converter for property '%s'", property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
179                if( determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverter ) )
180                {
181                    builder.addStatement( "final $1T retValue = new $2T<>( lambda, $3T.INSTANCE )", handlerType, SimpleCmdLineValueHandler.class, stringConverter );
182                }
183                else
184                {
185                    if( property.isEnum() )
186                    {
187                        builder.addStatement( "final $1T retValue = new $2T<>( lambda, new $3T( $4T.class ) )", handlerType, SimpleCmdLineValueHandler.class, stringConverter, property.getPropertyType() );
188                    }
189                    else
190                    {
191                        builder.addStatement( "final $1T retValue = new $2T<>( lambda, new $3T() )", handlerType, SimpleCmdLineValueHandler.class, stringConverter );
192                    }
193                }
194            });
195
196        final var method = getComposer().methodBuilder( retValue )
197            .addModifiers( PRIVATE, FINAL )
198            .addJavadoc(
199                """
200                Creates the value handler for the property &quot;$L.&quot;.
201                """, property.getPropertyName() )
202            .returns( handlerType, "The value handler." )
203            .addCode(
204                """
205                $L
206                """, createSuppressWarningsAnnotation( getComposer(), REDUNDANT_EXPLICIT_VARIABLE_TYPE ) )
207            .addStatement( "final $T lambda = $L", lambdaType, lambda )
208            .addCode( builder.build() )
209            .addCode( getComposer().createReturnStatement() )
210            .build();
211        addMethod( method );
212
213        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
214        return retValue;
215    }   //  composeValueHandlerCreation()
216
217    /**
218     *  Creates the implementation for the method
219     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.CLIBeanSpec#dumpParamFileTemplate(OutputStream)}.
220     */
221    private final void createDumpParamFileTemplate()
222    {
223        final var arg = getComposer().parameterBuilder( OutputStream.class, "outputStream", FINAL )
224            .build();
225        final var method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "dumpParamFileTemplate" )
226            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
227            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
228            .addParameter( arg )
229            .returns( VOID )
230            .addException( IOException.class )
231            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
232            .addStatement( "$T.dumpParamFileTemplate( $N, $N )", ConfigUtil.class, getField( STD_FIELD_CLIDefinitions ), arg )
233            .build();
234        addMethod( method );
235    }   //  createDumpParamFileTemplate()
236
237    /**
238     *  Creates the implementation for the method
239     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.CLIBeanSpec#parseCommandLine(String[])}.
240     *
241     *  @param  registry    The registry of the properties that are exposed for
242     *      the CLI.
243     *  @param  errorMsgHolder  The field for the parse errors.
244     */
245    private final void createParseCommandLine( final FieldSpec registry, final FieldSpec errorMsgHolder )
246    {
247        final TypeName typeName = ArrayTypeName.of( String.class );
248        final var arg = getComposer().parameterBuilder( typeName, "args", FINAL )
249            .build();
250        final var methodBuilder = getComposer().methodBuilder( "parseCommandLine" )
251            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
252            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
253            .addParameter( arg )
254            .returns( BOOLEAN )
255            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
256            .addStatement( "var retValue = true" );
257        if( isSynchronized() )
258        {
259            methodBuilder.beginControlFlow(
260            """
261                try( final var ignored = $N.lock() )
262                """, getField( STD_FIELD_WriteLock ) );
263        }
264        else
265        {
266            methodBuilder.beginControlFlow(
267            """
268                try
269                """ );
270        }
271        methodBuilder.addStatement( "$T.parseCommandLine( $N, $N )", ConfigUtil.class, registry, arg )
272            .addStatement( "$N = null", errorMsgHolder )
273            .nextControlFlow(
274                """
275
276                catch( final $T e )
277                """, CmdLineException.class )
278            .addStatement( "$N = e.getLocalizedMessage()", errorMsgHolder )
279            .addStatement( "retValue = false" )
280            .endControlFlow()
281            .addCode( getComposer().createReturnStatement() )
282            .build();
283
284        final var method =methodBuilder.build();
285
286        addMethod( method );
287    }   //  createParseCommandLine()
288
289    /**
290     *  Creates the implementation for the method
291     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.CLIBeanSpec#printUsage(OutputStream, CharSequence)}.
292     *
293     *  @param  registry    The registry of the properties that are exposed for
294     *      the CLI.
295     */
296    private final void createPrintUsage( final FieldSpec registry )
297    {
298        final var arg0 = getComposer().parameterBuilder( OutputStream.class, "outputStream", FINAL )
299            .build();
300        final var arg1 = getComposer().parameterBuilder( CharSequence.class, "command", FINAL )
301            .build();
302        final var method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "printUsage" )
303            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
304            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
305            .addParameter( arg0 )
306            .addParameter( arg1 )
307            .returns( VOID )
308            .addException( IOException.class )
309            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
310            .addStatement( "$T.printUsage( $N, $N(), $N, $N )", ConfigUtil.class, arg0, getMethod( STD_METHOD_GetRessourceBundle ), arg1, registry )
311            .build();
312        addMethod( method );
313    }   //  createPrintUsage()
314
315    /**
316     *  Creates the implementation for the method
317     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.CLIBeanSpec#retrieveParseErrorMessage()}.
318     *
319     *  @param  errorMsgHolder  The field for the parse errors.
320     */
321    private final void createRetrieveParseErrorMessage( final FieldSpec errorMsgHolder )
322    {
323        final var typeName = ParameterizedTypeName.from( Optional.class, String.class );
324        final var method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "retrieveParseErrorMessage" )
325            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
326            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
327            .returns( typeName )
328            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
329            .addStatement( "return $T.ofNullable( $N )", Optional.class, errorMsgHolder )
330            .build();
331        addMethod( method );
332    }   //  createRetrieveParseErrorMessage()
333
334    /**
335     *  Is called by
336     *  {@link #build()}
337     *  to do the work – only if there is work to do …
338     */
339    private final void doBuild()
340    {
341        //---* Create the registry for the CLI definitions *-------------------
342        final var registryType = ParameterizedTypeName.from( ClassName.from( List.class ), TypeName.from( CLIDefinition.class ) );
343        final var registry = getComposer().fieldBuilder( registryType, STD_FIELD_CLIDefinitions.toString(), PRIVATE, FINAL )
344            .addJavadoc(
345                """
346                The registry for the CLI definitions
347                """ )
348            .initializer( "new $T<>()", ArrayList.class )
349            .build();
350        addField( STD_FIELD_CLIDefinitions, registry );
351
352        //---* Create the field for the CLI parsing errors *-------------------
353        final var errorMsgHolder = getComposer().fieldBuilder( String.class, STD_FIELD_CLIError.toString(), PRIVATE )
354            .addJavadoc(
355                """
356                The last error message from a call to
357                {@link #parseCommandLine(String[])}.
358
359                @see #retrieveParseErrorMessage()
360                """ )
361            .initializer( "null" )
362            .build();
363        addField( STD_FIELD_CLIError, errorMsgHolder );
364
365        //---* Add the methods from CLIBeanSpec *------------------------------
366        createDumpParamFileTemplate();
367        createParseCommandLine( registry, errorMsgHolder );
368        createPrintUsage( registry );
369        createRetrieveParseErrorMessage( errorMsgHolder );
370
371        /*
372         * The names of previously encountered options, collected to avoid
373         * collisions.
374         */
375        final Collection<String> alreadyUsedOptions = new HashSet<>();
376
377        //---* Add the code to the constructor *-------------------------------
378        final var objectType = WildcardTypeName.subtypeOf( Object.class );
379        final var handlerName = "valueHandler";
380        final var handlerType = ParameterizedTypeName.from( ClassName.from( CmdLineValueHandler.class ), objectType );
381
382        final var definitionName = "cliDefinition";
383
384        final var builder = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder().add(
385                """
386    
387                /*
388                 * Initialise the CLI definitions.
389                 */
390                """ )
391            .addStatement( "$T $L", handlerType, handlerName )
392            .addStatement( "$T $L", CLIDefinition.class, definitionName );
393
394        CLIPropertiesLoop:
395        //noinspection ForLoopWithMissingComponent
396        for( final var i = getProperties(); i.hasNext(); )
397        {
398            final var property = i.next();
399            if( !property.isOnCLI() ) continue CLIPropertiesLoop;
400
401            //---* Create the value handler *----------------------------------
402            builder.add(
403                    """
404                    
405                    /*
406                     * CLI definition for Property &quot;$L&quot;.
407                     */
408                    """, property.getPropertyName()
409                )
410                .addStatement( "$L = $L()", handlerName, composeValueHandlerCreation( property ) );
411
412            //---* Create the CLI definition *---------------------------------
413            final var usage = property.getCLIUsage().orElse( null );
414            final var usageKey = property.getCLIUsageKey().orElse( null );
415            final var metaVar = property.getCLIMetaVar().orElse( null );
416            final var required = Boolean.valueOf( property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_CLI_MANDATORY ) );
417            final var multiValued = Boolean.valueOf( property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_CLI_MULTIVALUED ) );
418            final var format = property.getCLIFormat().orElse( null );
419            if( property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_IS_ARGUMENT ) )
420            {
421                builder.addStatement( "$1L = new $2T( $3S, $4L, $5S, $6S, $7S, $8L, $9L, $10L, $1S )",
422                    definitionName,
423                    CLIArgumentDefinition.class,
424                    property.getPropertyName(),
425                    Integer.valueOf( property.getCLIArgumentIndex().orElseThrow( () -> new IllegalAnnotationError( format( MSG_NoArgumentIndex, property.getPropertyName() ) ) ) ),
426                    usage,
427                    usageKey,
428                    metaVar,
429                    required,
430                    handlerName,
431                    multiValued,
432                    format );
433            }
434            else if( property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_IS_OPTION ) )
435            {
436                final var optionNames = property.getCLIOptionNames().orElseThrow( () -> new IllegalAnnotationError( format( MSG_NoOptionName, property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
437                for( final var optionName : optionNames )
438                {
439                    if( !alreadyUsedOptions.add( optionName ) )
440                    {
441                        throw new IllegalAnnotationError( format( MSG_DuplicateOptionName, optionName, property.getPropertyName() ) );
442                    }
443                }
444                final var names = optionNames.stream()
445                    .map( n -> format( "\"%s\"", n ) )
446                    .collect( joining( ", ", "List.of( ", " )" ) );
447                builder.addStatement( "$1L = new $2T( $3S, $4L, $5S, $6S, $7S, $8L, $9L, $10L, $11S )",
448                    definitionName,
449                    CLIOptionDefinition.class,
450                    property.getPropertyName(),
451                    names,
452                    usage,
453                    usageKey,
454                    metaVar,
455                    required,
456                    handlerName,
457                    multiValued,
458                    format );
459            }
460            else
461            {
462                throw new IllegalAnnotationError( format( MSG_InvalidCLIType, property.getPropertyName() ) );
463            }
464            builder.addStatement( "$N.add( $L )", registry, definitionName );
465        }
466        addConstructorCode( builder.build() );
467    }   //  doBuild()
468
469    /**
470     *  <p>{@summary Retrieves the class for the value handler for the given
471     *  property.} If returning
472     *  {@link Optional#empty()} empty},
473     *  an instance of
474     *  {@link SimpleCmdLineValueHandler}
475     *  must be used that will be instantiated with the
476     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.StringConverter}
477     *  retrieved by a call to
478     *  {@link PropertySpec#getStringConverterClass()}.</p>
479     *
480     *  @param  property    The property.
481     *  @return An instance of
482     *      {@link Optional}
483     *      that holds the respective type name.
484     */
485    private final Optional<TypeName> retrieveValueHandlerClass( final PropertySpec property )
486    {
487        var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( property, "property" ).getCLIValueHandlerClass();
488        if( retValue.isEmpty() )
489        {
490            final var handlerClass = m_HandlerClasses.get( property.getPropertyType() );
491            if( nonNull( handlerClass ) )
492            {
493                retValue = Optional.of( handlerClass );
494            }
495        }
496        ifDebug( a ->
497        {
498            final var propertyName = ((PropertySpec) a [0]).getPropertyName();
499            final var propertyType = ((PropertySpec) a [0]).getPropertyType().toString();
500            //noinspection unchecked
501            final var handlerClass = Objects.toString( ((Optional<TypeName>) a [1]).orElse( null ) );
502            return format( "property: %1$s%n\tpropertyType: %2$s%n\thandlerClass: %3$s", propertyName, propertyType, handlerClass );
503        }, property, retValue );
504
505        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
506        return retValue;
507    }   //  retrieveValueHandlerClass()
508}
509//  class CLIBeanBuilder
510
511/*
512 *  End of File
513 */
